name: Klee (signerlabs)
description: [项目级] Secure and local AI on your desktop with a built-in RAG knowledge base and Markdown note support.。来源: https://github.com/signerlabs/Klee

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content: Klee is a modern desktop application that combines AI-powered chat, knowledge base management, and note-taking capabilities. It offers both **Cloud Mode** for seamless synchronization and **Private Mode** for complete offline functionality.
